title: PolyBTC
author: PolyBTC
content: Hello Ladys and Gentleman.Our Presale Stage have began and runs until the 20th of February 2023.PolyBTC (PBTC) stands for high quality deplovement on real long term. PolyBTC is a Bep20 Token and runs on the Binance Smart Chain.Until 2028 just 53% of the total supply will be in circulation. The left Tokens saving the deplovement till 2073 and longer.For detailled informations check our Website and following links ✔️Website: https://www.polybtc.net/Whitepaper: https://www.polybtc.net/whitepaperRoadmap: https://www.polybtc.net/roadmap-until-2073Presale: https://www.polybtc.net/presaleSmart Contract: https://bscscan.com/token/0x434f30874b8Bf94cab10771E60F96F2De539317bFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/polybtcfacebookTwitter: https://twitter.com/NewCrypto2023Telegram: https://t.me/polybtcIn addition, 4 different types of airdrops are offered.One that is linked to a payment of 72 cents in BNB and then you get coins for 1.50. Here's the link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NaGwDhybu6iXCh9q9aeOUNTn9w4JS7CrjzYG3gkz264/edit#heading=h.fzy9h1qa6hs7Next there is one for the Facebook algorithm, where you can get 50,000 coins. Here is the link for you: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1o7rkPpt6zOZHkFxte0QPgxAwKxEoZJElFcsRxNp-YcY/edit?fbclid=IwAR2lBzu1yPDeehPSQgWksMYPglFobEVmdpb-aHvQ6Zr6fuTZbmElW3WBSdk#heading=h.nconrnb.03t7conrnb.03t7conrnb.03t7conrnb.wingThere is the same again for Twitter, where you can dust off another 25,000 coins. Here is the link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16yQVJ9bTL1u-RYlSogH_EGlQR4Q_UNtxpTvO6bzHudU/The fourth and final airdrop is a small one for everyone. You don't have to do anything there. Just email your bep20 token address there. You get 10,000 free coins for this. Mail: polybtc@outlook.comWebsites where PolyBTC already is listed are:https://coinsgem.com/token/0x434f30874b8Bf94cab10771E60F96F2De539317b https://thebittimes.com/token-PBTC-BSC-0x434f30874b8Bf94cab10771E60F96F2De539317b.htmlhttps://www.coinscope.co/coin/pbtchttps://watcher.guru/coin/polybtchttps://www.coinscout.cc/listing/polybtc/https://coinxhigh.com/todays-best-cryptocurrencies/polybtc https://coinhunters.cc/tokens/PolyBTC https://coinmooner.com/coin/20804https://coinalpha.app/new-born/0x434f30874b8bf94cab10771e60f96f2de539317b https://coinhunt.cc/coin/bc2a8273-07c8-4c28-8126-29faa5fcdba0https://goshfinder.com/coin/polybtchttps://www.freshcoins.io/coins/polybtchttps://cointoplist.net/coin/polybtchttps://coindiscovery.app/coin/polybtc/overviewJoin our Telegram and check us out. Follow us on our Rise, the next 10 - 20 years getting really interesting Best RegardsYour PolyBTC Team*through the price fluctation in the cryptocurrency market some airdrop conditions will change soon.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 20, 2022, 04:49:19 PMHello Ladys and Gentleman.Our Presale Stage have began and runs until the 20th of February 2023.[...]Until 2028 just 53% of the total supply will be in circulation. The left Tokens saving the deplovement till 2073 and longer.[...]My eyes rolled so high at these roadmap timeline. 1 year of presale? Presale? Anyway, I find something that's a bit worrying on your whitepaper. Mind to answer the concerns here?Oh, almost forgot the nice red eye catcher:Plagiarism Detected

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: you not even read correctly, there stands nothing from one year. And yes, we stay anonymous to the public. For Exchanges we provide everything what is needed. the text to the smart chain is for sure a standartised c&p text, but it must be in the whitepaper. best regards

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 05:47:47 PMreported to mod, sry but simply you cant do those things here. we provided our tax number and everything and we are legit.check our whitepaper and scroll complete down, you will see something there.Check the Binance Terms of Service, you will find something there.Quote from: https://www.binance.com/en/termsWithout prior written consent from Binance, you may not modify, replicate, duplicate, copy, download, store, further transmit, disseminate, transfer, disassemble, broadcast, publish, remove or alter any copyright statement or label, or license, sub-license, sell, mirror, design, rent, lease, private label, grant security interests in the properties or any part of the properties, or create their derivative works or otherwise take advantage of any part of the properties.I assume you have written consent from Binance to use their materials? And by the way, plagiarism is equal to stealing, and lying, stealing, and cheating are all inappropriate behaviors.

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: Updateregarding the crying of you, cause of long presale time.We got a free listing offer from MintMe Exchange which is a CMC Exchange. We get listed there soon and changing our concept + roadmap.As second, we contacted Stex Exchange, which is EU regulated regarding listing in the usdt trading pair. That will be a payed listing. The listing form we filled out already and expect the answer tomorow.Then we are by end of next Week already on two Exchanges and you can cry how you want. We are legit.Wish u a nice Sunday.Best Regards

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: Still no message here from the moderators, so we think that you are using your position here to "make" the market. You will find an announcement to thatsoon on reddit and i will pay for that extra that it gets pushed.Currently we got simply no time to be here all day.Accordingto the roadmap our targets are reached already and i know.. people in crypto like to make fud but that what is going on here is not serious from your side anymore and like that we will react.Contacted the mods, can provide absolutely everything and noteven get a reply... Poor, deat bitcointalk team... very poor.so have a nice day anyway, check our telegram, website, google and social media. then you will see that all is legit.in around a month we got more time to be here and will clarify this! Also you will see the exchanges that we go! Not funny dear btctalk team... really not funny.hope really that i find an impressum here with an postal address..

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.created_time: July 01, 2022, 08:41:52 AMLast edit: July 01, 2022, 10:06:03 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: @FatFork: honestly i am not interested what you think. sure, every shitcoin got already agreements for 9 exchanges after 7 weeks and for sure also every shitcoin will have a offshore company register after 2,5 month.. not need to talk with you.to the mod thing, simply that they stop this when providing that legit, not more.@Gulf_Official: its simply like that, that most projects going under cause they plan just "short" time, for 5 years or something. simply unexpirienced owners what know nothing about crypto.The altcoin market was getting really worse over the last years and thats why we planned our two projects.till 2028 a maximum of 47% will be in circulation.Nobody knows now what is in future, so in 10,20 or even 30,40 years. Bitcoin is on his way just since 2009, 13 years now just.I have worked at/for several projects since 2016 already, know some people from a few blockchain summits, know how to make good deals with exchanges, list mcap sites and everything around the etablishment process.the other 53% of all tokens are simply future savings what additionally allow us to go later also in app deplovement for example or also list a new exchange in 50 years... Nobody can say now what comes in future and i simply think: that are my projects, and after the etablishing i will live and work from and on it all my life. I got the founds to start, so i will do. Also in general:From mid these month i am heading from germany to belize regarding the offshore company registration. Here in germany is no way regarding the tax law and as normally digital nomad i will head to there, live and work also from there. They simply provide 0 tax for international companies which making no business inside the country.Will publish all to that when its at the time.Also, the next: I talked with digifinex and bitmart! More i dont say, but with bitmart i will soon publish something. They will allow and confirm that we publish the listing agreement before we get listed there! (for all the fudders here) Then i guess this topic should be without fud! The whitepaper is changed long time and it was the official bep20 token desription what you find everywhere around the internet.
